product_name: MILK MAKEUPCooling Water Jelly Tint Lip + Cheek Blush Stain
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackMilk Makeup Cooling Water Jelly Tint is the OG 10x award-winning, long-lasting jelly blush and lip stain with a bouncy texture for sheer, buildable color.
details: DetailsBenefitsFirst-of-its-kind jelly lip and cheek stainInnovative cooling and refreshing jelly textureGlides on sheer and builds to a vibrant, watercolor-like finishLong-lasting burst of colorSkin-loving ingredientsNon-comedogenic so it won't clog poresNon-acnegenic so it won't cause breakoutsWorks across a wide range of skin tonesOver 1,000 swipes in every stick90% natural10x award-winningKey IngredientsVegan collagen visibly firms skinAloe soothes and refreshes skinSeawater helps hydrate skin and gives a refreshing, cooling effectFormulated WithoutParabensItem 2634992How To UseOn first use: Gently twist off the protective cap to remove and discard.Gently swipe or swirl the stick directly onto lip and cheeks.It dries fast, so work one cheek at a time and blend quickly with fingers, brush or sponge.Build to your desired payoff.Close cap back on tightly (listen for the click!) and store at room temperature, away from direct sunlight.Pro Tip: Swipe a makeup brush over the stick, then onto cheeks for a softer, more diffused blush look. For more intense color, swipe on multiple layers. Want an even cooler refresh? Store your stick in the fridge.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Niacinamide, Hibiscus Rosa-Sinensis Flower Extract, Hylocereus Undatus Fruit Extract, Kappaphycus Alvarezii Extract, Tremella Fuciformis Polysaccharide, Chlorella Ferment, Tocopherol, Maris Aqua/Sea Water/Eau De Mer, Allantoin, Agarose, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Pvm/Ma Copolymer, Potassium Carbonate, Citric Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzoic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Red 22 (CI 45380), Red 28 (CI 45410), Red 33 (CI 17200).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: On first use: Gently twist off the protective cap to remove and discard.Gently swipe or swirl the stick directly onto lip and cheeks.It dries fast, so work one cheek at a time and blend quickly with fingers, brush or sponge.Build to your desired payoff.Close cap back on tightly (listen for the click!) and store at room temperature, away from direct sunlight.Pro Tip: Swipe a makeup brush over the stick, then onto cheeks for a softer, more diffused blush look. For more intense color, swipe on multiple layers. Want an even cooler refresh? Store your stick in the fridge.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: I did not care for the item, it looked like I ate a red popsicle.

reviews.headline: Would not buy this again
reviews.comments:
Even using Weleda cream as a base, this product sticks and will not allow for blending nor smoothing out.
It's almost as if a dye stamp hits your face and you are stuck with a circular red spot.
Great concept but horrible in its execution.

reviews.headline: Good, but hard to blend
reviews.comments: Pretty color and lasts long but is hard to blend. Even if I don't directly apply it to my face is still is difficult to blend. Love the way it feels though and has plenty of product.

reviews.headline: Does not last long as lip tint.
reviews.comments: Does not last long as lip tint. I don't feel any hydration, and it goes away quite quickly when using as lip tint.

reviews.headline: Why did it fall out?
reviews.comments:
I absolutely love this jelly tint, but unfortunately, the packaging is not so great. I've only had this for a week and it already fell out of its tubing right into my sink. Fortunately, I was able to save it and stick it back inâ€¦ 

I love it, but the packaging sucks. Be careful with your Jelly!

The pigment is amazing. The feel is awesome, but it's a little hard to get full coverage without putting it on a few/bunch of times.  But I will say there's nothing like it and it's a great idea. Just needs a little more tinkering.

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: Just disappointed I was really excited but not worth the hype at all. I would only be able to wear it as a base blush. It does not work for me because I ordered fresh and it was too bright with blending well.

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: At first, when I used it, I didn't like it. But now, I love it! It stays on all day, and it feels so good. It's one of my favorites, and I recommend it to everyone. At first when I used it I did not like it but now I love it it stays on all day and it feels so good it is one of my favorites I recommend it to everyone

reviews.headline: It was okay but I would not buy it again.
reviews.comments: It was okay, when I tried to blend it on my cheeks it dried  immediately. I could not get it off my cheeks , but when I put it on my lips it was okay. I would not buy it again though.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: Good blush stains very well but I left in the car while I finished shopping and it melted and I had to clean it off when I got home and it was gross and now it's kinda deformed but I would recommend bit it was very hot wham this did happen but I love the color and would buy it just don't leave it in a hot car lol

reviews.headline: Looks natural and glowy!
reviews.comments: This is my favortie blush! I have light/medium skin and i got the shade "chill". It looks so natural and gives me the perfect blushed glow! Its a bit hard to blend so i recommend putting it on a fluffy brush firsr and layering it on.

reviews.headline: Horrific packaging
reviews.comments: Broke and went down the drain after a few uses

reviews.headline: So pretty!
reviews.comments: This tint is so pretty on the cheeks and lips I'm obsessed and it stays on my lips all day and cheeks never returning and definitely buying more.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this because I saw so many good reviews but is a waste of money ðŸ’° It makes my lips look like I was sucking on a lolly pop

reviews.headline: Would not buy again
reviews.comments: I loved the color and cool feeling when I first applied this, until I realized how hard to blend it is. The color is really pretty and feels good on the skin. I have to go in with a wet beauty blender and really blend out the edges though. Sometimes I even spray my face with a facial mist to get it to blend better. Definitely one of those products that's not worth the hype.

reviews.headline: my goodnessðŸ˜›
reviews.comments: i went to a concert recently and wore this as blush and a lip tint and let me tell you. this was the best thing that held on to my face the entire time, whenever i go to the beach i look sunkissed because i wear it its just so pleasent and i love it

reviews.headline: Best blush ever!
reviews.comments: I love it! The key to making it work for me is a fluffy  power brush. It works like magic. It gives a beautiful lift from within glow.  Great summer lightweight blush!

reviews.headline: Love the look, but it broke.
reviews.comments: I love the look of this blush, but it broke and went flying across my counter. I barely had it twisted up and it broke. It ruined my counter. Also, do not get it on your fingers. It will stay on your hands for hours despite washing.

reviews.headline: Dissaponting
reviews.comments: I'm so disappointed.I've never seen was immediately attracted to the bright colors and bouncy jelly texture. But the product is horrible to blend and just makes you look like a clown. I'm still looking for my perfect blush

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I bought this in the color fresh for the first time. I absolutely love it. I use it to stain my lips and then I go over it with a regular lipstick and just a tad bit of gloss. It helps the lipstick and gloss stay on so well and leave such a pretty color behind. I also tried it for blush and it worked really well too. You just have to blend it out very quickly.

reviews.headline: Wonderful
reviews.comments: Loved her. I thought would be disappointed. But it was beautiful. You do have to work fast with blending though.

faceoff_positive.comments: The texture of these truly is a fun experience, but my concern going into this was: is it practical?As a person with dry skin, I had quite a learning curve with this product. At first, I tried using it as a blush over my foundation/powder. That did not work out well at all, as I noticed it was nearly impossible to blend the product (regardless of how I applied: I tried fingers, using a brush to pick up the product, and the worst of all - directly swiping on skin!) I ended up removing this in all scenarios as it created a harsh line of demarcation on my face. Not a cute look!I then tried it as a lip stain, and while that worked fairly well, it seemed to only stain the center of my lips. So far, this was seeming like a dud of a product!However, I am a determined soul. So I finally decided to use my heftiest moisturizer, a lip balm on my lips, and THEN try this product. And what do you know - that created a lovely look. I could blend any way I wanted, and the lip stain was lovely. AND GET THIS: even over all this moisture, this product LASTS. The entire day. It's hard to fathom the staying power of this product!So, what did we learn here? Well, if you have dry (or dehydrated!) skin, especially if you also wear foundation, this may be a bit of a struggle. However, you can still work with these if you moisturize HEAVILY. Oily skin types, you may be all ears as this might be the PERFECT product for you. I hear you all struggle with longevity, and this product really shines in that attribute.Product gifted by Milk in exchange for my honest thoughts!
faceoff_positive.headline: oily skin types, this might be for you!

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought this product because I wanted to try a new blush & I like the cooling water serum so I decided to give the new ph jelly blush a try. You can't see it when its first applied so that makes it super hard to know if you've applied enough & if you have blended it enough. On me it always comes up WAY too pigmented and like a hot pink color, it looks almost childish on me, even with the smallest dot that I try to apply with the product & it also does not blend well, I blend right after applying and its always blotchy with bald patches because well when your blending it, you can't see what your blending. I give 2 stars instead of 1 because the product feels so good on the skin so cold & like fresh? But I wouldn't purchase this again, especially not the ph version.
faceoff_negative.headline: Way Too Pigmented

rollup.name: Cooling Water Jelly Tint Lip + Cheek Blush Stain
